headline.main: U.S. TANKS LEAD BIG DESERT DRIVE; Americans Check Performance as British Open Their Most Formidable Push of War

lead_paragraph: WITH A BRITISH ARMORED FORCE, in the Western Desert, Nov. 19 -- The British Army is sweeping forward today in the opening phases of the most heavily mounted offensive it has yet launched on land in this war. In the number of tanks, planes and men available it is the most formidable force the British have been able to throw against the Axis.
abstract: hope to drive Axis from Africa and remove threat to Suez

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
